answers.answer: its possible first try to monitor sugar in foods better and if this still causes a problem i would def get this checked out....

A great place to start is having his Doctor giving him a good physical. If he has any form of diabetes it should be easy enough for his doctor to find. Also some basic blood work can rule out a lot. After that's done only then can you really deal with ED.For what its worth I have mild To moderate ED and cialis 5mg works great for me.

question: i am pretty sure my husband has diabetes ...he has increased thirst.fatigue and cannot get an erection since he has started having dizzy symptoms...i am so scared and he is over weight.
title: my husband gets dizzy and his ed has worsend he also has fatigue
